title: Happy and Sad and Other Tootalot Feelings
description: Francis Arthur is a member of the Tootalot family, and you probably are too! Award-winning parenting author, dons a pen name and introduces Francis Arthur Tootalot in this funny read-aloud that brings giggles and some important ways to deal with feelings such as that happy, sad, and more. Children can play along with their own Tootalot articulated puppets offered free for download and assembly with paper fasteners. For bedtime and playtime.
author: Lou Jenkins
